item.description:
For the third year in a row, we have a military Air Show to look forward to. Take this rare chance to see the Blue Angels and much more at the Air Show at the end of July.

Where: Portsmouth International Airport at Pease Tradeport, Portsmouth, NH

When: Saturday June 30th and Sunday July 1st, gates open at 8AM

What: The schedule runs from 9AM-5PM each day, with the Blue Angels scheduled for just after 3PM.

There will much more than just the Blue Angels, though, both in the air and on the ground. For details, see:

  • Featured Performers
  • Static (on the ground) Aircraft
  • Performance Schedule

How Much: Tickets are $20 in advance, $25 at the gate, $35 in advance for Box Seats. Seniors, military, and kids 6-11 get a five-buck discount. Under 6 are free. Parking is $10. But wait! There's more. Thee are additional offerings, such as the Flight Line club, which includes all the beer you can drink, on-site reserved parking, and access to air conditioned bathrooms for $125. Sign up early if you want the $15,000 private chalet, and be sure to invite your photo friends!

For more on pricing and to order tickets online, click here. But that's not all, there's EVEN MORE! If you're like me, you'll want that special treatment as a photographer and here's your chance to grab it. You can purchase special passes for photographers and get the VIP treatment. The Air Show Photo Tour runs 7-9AM, includes media parking pass, and runs $50 per day or $80 per weekend. Then, for an additional $25/day or $40/weekend, there's the Photo Pit add-on, which gives you:

  • Exclusive photography area on the flight line during the show
  • Upgrade available only to Photo Tour purchasers
  • LIMITED number of passes are available
  • Water to be provided all day
  • Area for credentialed Pit Pass holders only (no family or additional guests)
  • $8 in food vouchers issued for use in public concession area

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Join up with the Photo Tour.
item.name: New England Air Show with Blue Angels
